title: Giveaway Entry
description:
1x entry into the current giveaway.

Don't redeem unless Adam says you can.

title: 1-on-1 Call w/ Adam
description: You'll be sent a scheduling link to have a 30-minute, 1-on-1 call with Adam live on Twitch!

title: Chance at a MacBook?
name: macbook
description: Redeeming this gives you a 0.01% chance at winning a brand new MacBook Pro! Yes, I'll ship it to you, wherever you live. I've shipped prizes to Italy and Iceland in the past!
